name: Grapple Hoops
description:
FEATURES

  • Singleplayer
  • Player Customization
  • Level Editor

FAST-PACED AND AGGRESSIVE COMBAT


Outmaneuver opponents as you wall run and slide behind them leaving them paralyzed after a devastating blow with a basketball to the head.

FAST AND FLUID GAMEPLAY


Grapple and swing around like crazy, kick doors and windows, run horizontally on any wall, slide under obstacles, use bounce tires to get launched up in the air and hit top speed quickly zipping down wire lines.
